search.query: | mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=cpu.usage_iowait OR metric_name=cpu.usage_steel OR metric_name=cpu.usage_system OR metric_name=cpu.usage_user OR metric_name=cpu.usage_idle host=* by metric_name span=1s | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(cpu.*) as "cpu.*" by _time | timechart minspan=1m bins=1000 avg(cpu.usage_*) AS "avg cpu * %"
